author: Laura Hoy
title: Japan Lied About Coronavirus to Keep Olympics, Former PM Says
description: As the number of new coronavirus cases spikes, suspicion is rising that Tokyo understated its coronavirus cases to hold on to the summer Olympics. The post Japan Lied About Coronavirus to Keep Olympics, Former PM Says appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Tokyos sudden spike in coronavirus cases has raised questions about the governments transparency.
